Terms and Conditions for Ceramic Studio

Studio Access & Hours

  • Studio access is limited to registered students and members during posted hours
  • All users must sign in upon arrival and follow safety protocols
  • Children under 16 must be accompanied by an adpt at all times

Equipment & Materials

  • Studio equipment must be used only for its intended purpose
  • Users are responsible for cleaning tools and workspace after each session
  • Personal clay and glazes must be clearly labeled with name and date
  • Unclaimed work will be disposed of after 30 days

Safety Requirements

  • Closed-toe shoes are mandatory at all times
  • Long hair must be tied back when working
  • Users must attend a safety orientation before first use
  • Report all accidents or equipment malfunctions immediately

Firing & Glazing Policies

  • fees are separate from studio time
  • Work must be bone dry before bisque firing
  • Glazed pieces ready for firing must be dropped off by posted deadlines
  • Studio is not responsible for pieces that crack or break during firing

Liability & Insurance

  • Users participate at their own risk
  • Studio is not liable for personal injury or damage to personal property
  • Users are responsible for damage to studio equipment due to misuse
  • All work is created at user's own risk - no guarantees on final respts

Payment & Cancellation

  • All fees are due at time of registration
  • 24-hour notice required for class cancellations
  • No refunds for missed sessions
  • Studio reserves right to cancel classes due to low enrollment

Code of Conduct

  • Respectfp behavior toward staff and other users is required
  • No food or drinks near clay work areas
  • Smoking and alcohol are prohibited
  • Studio reserves right to revoke membership for policy violations
